messages.title: The Strong Voice for All
messages.content: Henrietta Bewley promises to be a strong voice for all in her constituency.

messages.title: This is Our Chance for Change
messages.content: The Conservative Party is now the party of extreme hard Brexit. Labour are too weak and divided to oppose the Conservatives. Only Tim Farron’s Liberal Democrats are speaking up for everyone in Plymouth who wants to stop a hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Penny on Income Tax for NHS, transform mental health care, better integration of health and social care.
£7 billion extra in children's education, increase school budgets, introduce a fairer national funding formula.
Support for the Royal Marines, opposing further cuts to the Royal Marines.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Plymouth's exports go to the EU, 60%.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May's Brexit plans, cutting UK ties with EU, 60% of Plymouth's exports go to EU at risk.
issues.defence: Support for the Royal Marines, opposing further cuts to Royal Marines.
issues.education: £7 billion extra in children's education, increase school budgets, introduce a fairer national funding formula.
issues.health: Penny on Income Tax for NHS, transform mental health care, better integration of health and social care.

community.content: Local community development, support for schools and NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Henrietta Bewley promises to be a strong voice for all in her constituency.

contactInformation.address: Plymouth Lib Dems, PO BOX 152, Plymouth, PL7 2BL

endorsements.endorsement: Support for the Royal Marines, opposing further cuts to the Royal Marines.

quotes.text: The Royal Marines have carried the greatest burden in the defence of our country over the last decade... we need them as never before!
